SEARCH
Package domain

Class User.Builder

java.lang.Object
domain.User.Builder
Enclosing class:
User
public static class User.Builder extends Object
Builder class for constructing User instances with validation. Implements a fluent interface for setting properties and includes validation of required fields before building the User object.

    • build

      public User build() throws InformationRequiredExceptionUser
      Builds the User instance after validating all required fields. Automatically generates and hashes a secure password.
      Returns:
      The constructed User instance
